name: Katy Gibson
text: It was ok..same as usual however, if you are looking for that thick crust with the buttery crunchy bottom (which I was) that they currently advertising this is NOT THAT.  I was so excited to have that perfect crunchy buttery bite, they tried to capture that old style, unfortunately they missed.

name: Heather Wooten
text: Very clean, and the average Pizza Hut. We went for the lunch Buffet and over all it was good. No specialty pizza at out. I like trying new pizza flavors. They where short staffed and it was very clear one lady was running entire dinning room at lunch. She did a great job. Pictures of the salad bar and pizza section.

text: Topping was slim very slim I don't mind paying more but  supreme pizzas have way more toppings than just three to four toppings this is the second time my pizza was very low on toppings

text: Pizza Hut was very good had a salad bar with a calzone type Pizza. It was hot and well-cooked I'm not a big fan of the sauce too sweet for me. My wife had wings I believe the wings are slightly overpriced for what you get. Overall a pretty good experience.
